title: Revolutionary Communist Party of Ivory Coast
text:
The Revolutionary Communist Party of Ivory Coast (, PCRCI) is a <a href="communist%20party">communist party</a> in <a href="Ivory%20Coast">Ivory Coast</a>. It has been led by Achy Ekissi since 1990. Its youth wing is the <a href="Communist%20Youth%20of%20Ivory%20Coast">Communist Youth of Ivory Coast</a>. The party newspaper is the "Révolution Prolétarienne".
Internationally, it participates in the <a href="International%20Conference%20of%20Marxist-Leninist%20Parties%20and%20Organizations%20%28Unity%20%26amp%3B%20Struggle%29">International Conference of Marxist-Leninist Parties and Organizations</a>, an international network of Communist parties that uphold the line of <a href="Enver%20Hoxha">Enver Hoxha</a> and the <a href="Albanian%20Party%20of%20Labour">Albanian Party of Labour</a>. As such, it is staunchly <a href="anti-revisionist">anti-revisionist</a>.
